participant_1.background:
I was looking forward to spending time with my girlfriend, but she ended up cancelling last minute.
I'd brag about my knowledge of the Beatles' music and history.
I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.
i have one little girl.
I'm not a big fan of dressing up, but I do like to wear comfortable clothes.

participant_2.background:
On the weekend, I might drum in a band or watch a movie about aliens invading the earth.
I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.
my dad is an airline pilot.
I spent my summer eating burritos and traveling the world.
i have two brothers.

content.text: Hey! Hows your day going?
Hey! It's going great, thanks for asking! How about yours?
It's going okay. I was looking forward to spending some time with my girlfriend, but she ended up canceling last minute.
Oh no! That's too bad. What did you have planned?
We were going to go out to dinner and then see a movie.
That sounds like a fun date! Maybe you can reschedule for another time.
Yeah, I think I might.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, go for walks with my dog, and watch movies.
I like to drum in a band, watch movies, and travel.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to learn how to play the drums.
It's a lot of fun! I've been playing for about 10 years.
Wow! That's impressive.
Thanks!
What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a variety of music, but my favorite is rock.
Cool! I like rock music too.
Awesome! We should jam sometime.
That would be fun!
Great! I'll bring my drums
